description.title: Visibility Config: get logs, ContractCfg.TRANSPARENT, check events
description.purpose: Use a simple guessing game, with ContractCfg.TRANSPARENT. Two gateway connections are used, the first by a dev user that deploys the contract and the second by a player of the game. The dev user waits for the player to play some moves, then both users run a script to getPastEvents on the contract. The dev and game user should see both events.
